name: Facility-C
description:
The player ends up in the middle of nowhere. He has to fight through enemies and do parkour to get to the teleporter, which will bring him home. 

(Don't expect too much out of this, and if there are bugs, i may fix it but most likely move on to other projects I have in mind)

Enjoy the game anyways!

IMPORTANT INFO: The game is only compatible with Windows for now.
